name: Escape Jail 3D
description:
How good can you escape?

Escape Jail 3D lets you escape your way out of jail. This game is filled with love, romance, adventure, and drama. Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Escape Jail 3D lets you do just that with tons of levels to draw through!

Escape Jail 3D is an interactive drawing game that lets YOU choose your way through an epic story.

How does it work?
• Simply use your finger to tap each objective
• Try to get out of Jail!
• Discover all of the different level endings
• Immerse yourself in a world a choosing!
